examples.en: He shot straight.
Is my tie straight?
He stared straight ahead.
I went straight up to bed.
They clicked straight away.
The road was dead straight.
examples.ru: Дорога была совершенно прямой /прямой, как стрела/.

examples.en: She has long, straight hair.
The tree fell straight down.
The library is straight ahead.
We went straight up the cliff.
examples.ru: Мы шли вверх по крутому склону.

examples.en: Sit up straight, don't slouch.
I phoned my mum straight away.
examples.ru: Я сразу же позвонил своей маме.

examples.en: She lied with a straight face.
She was looking straight at me.
Try to keep your legs straight.
I like my martinis straight up.
examples.ru: Я люблю ледяной мартини из шейкера.

examples.en: Can you walk in a straight line?
The picture isn't quite straight.
Sit up straight and don't slouch.
Light travels in a straight line.
Always lift with a straight back.
examples.ru: Всегда поднимайте тяжести с прямой спиной.

examples.en: They sat down in a straight line.
Are you going straight to London?
I'd like a straight answer please.
examples.ru: Я бы хотел услышать прямой ответ, пожалуйста.

examples.en: Just give me a straight yes or no.
examples.ru: Просто скажи мне прямо: да или нет?

examples.en: Stand up straight and don't slouch!
Sit up straight. Please don't slouch.
A straight razor gives a close shave.
Turn left and then go straight ahead.
examples.ru: Поверните налево, а затем идите прямо.

examples.en: It's not a straight historical novel.
